backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and versioned Valentine snapshots with access control, write‑token checks, and blob‑storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for tracking UI and video‑page requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated list of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH colors with light/dark variants and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/demos/three-remote-video: Standalone demo page showing responsive grid loading of three remote videos with lazy loading and error handling.
frontend/REMOTE_VIDEO_SAVE_SPEC.md: Technical spec detailing the remote video save architecture, data flow, error handling, and backend–frontend responsibilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing pages, user input state, save/restore logic, and remote snapshot polling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders animated floating heart icons positioned around the screen.
frontend/src/components/SaveProgressButt: Save button with login handling, popover options, share link copying, and status display.
frontend/src/components/StepNavigation.t: Provides navigation controls between the landing, videos, and final steps.
Wraps pages in a themed layout with optional floating hearts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, and state exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentineSnapshotP: Polls remote snapshot versions and flags when a newer version is available without overwriting local edits.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark romantic color palettes, utility classes, glass/gradient styles, and floating heart animations.
frontend/src/lib/saveId.ts: Helpers to read, write, remove, and generate shareable links for saveId in the browser URL.
frontend/src/lib/valentineProgressStorag: Local progress persistence using localStorage for text and IndexedDB for video blobs, with save/load and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/lib/valentineRemoteProgress: Remote snapshot client handling validation, encoding, tokens, error normalization, and communication with the backend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry wrapping React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/FinalMessagePage.tsx: Page for editing the final message with a textarea and button to return to start.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page to input the initial Valentine message and proceed to video setup.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Page to preview videos, edit their titles, and navigate to the final message step.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities for clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended fonts, colors, border radii, and includes animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for a 3‑page Valentine’s website with real-time cloud-backed persistence.
